title: The One About All The Things Bob Hates
description:
On this week's episode Bob and Monét discuss electronic gadgets, social media couples, dramatic breakups, extreme mealpreppers, and whether or not they should buy a Tesla! Tune in for all the drama as Bob dives into everything he hates!!
For a limited time, we’ve partnered with Current to give away $1,000! That’s right, Current is giving away $250 to four listeners of this show. All you have to do is download the Current app and enter our code SIBLING during sign up before December 15th for a chance to win! Download the Current app, sign up in less than two minutes, and enter SIBLING for a chance to win $250! No purchase is necessary to win, purchase won’t increase chances of winning. Void where prohibited, eligibility restrictions apply. visit current.com/sibling for full Terms and Conditions.
This podcast is sponsored by BetterHelp and Sibling Rivalry listeners get 10% off their first month at betterhelp.com/RIVALRY
Make the switch to PrettyLitter TODAY—it’s just good sense. Go to PrettyLitter.com and use promo code rivalry for 20% off your first order. 
MyFitnessPal does way more than count calories! For a limited time, they are offering listeners three months of their premium membership for free! Already a member? No problem. You still claim this offer! Get your Premium membership by going to rivalry.MYFITNESSPAL.com and use code rivalry to get three months for FREE!
Go to Framebridge.com and use promo code RIVALRY to save an additional 15% off your first order!


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
